price: (13) Say, "Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day."
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ إِنۡ عَصَيۡتُ رَبِّي عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qul innī akhāfu in ʿaṣaytu rabbī ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
